urlInfo.title: play.game.com
urlInfo.name: Game.com 区块链游戏平台
urlInfo.text: 我们专注打造区块链数字货币的全球化游戏平台，通过创造和整合游戏内容的方式，结盟各家区块链数字货币的基金会，帮助各家的数字货币提供落地的娱乐服务应用场景，用娱乐内容的方式助力区块链技术快速普及和发展。

urlInfo.title: crowdfunding.game.com
urlInfo.name: 游戏众投发行
urlInfo.text: 打造全球游戏行业的众投发行和资讯的第一门户。由G资本孵化的独家优质项目，早鸟阶段特权仅支持G币参与，顶级稀缺资源一币难求!

urlInfo.title: wallet.game.com
urlInfo.name: G Wallet 数字资产钱包
urlInfo.text: 打造全球游戏玩家智能数字化资产钱包，实现数字资产管理，为未来 Game.com 孵化或众投的更多游戏项目代币提供钱包支持，拓展全球几十亿游戏玩家的数字化钱包的超级蓝海市场!

urlInfo.title: vc.game.com
urlInfo.name: G资本
urlInfo.text: 投资布局 - G资本设有游戏专项G币投资基金，投资游戏行业的优质项目，为G币持续不断的增加价值。

urlInfo.title: trading.game.com
urlInfo.name: 游戏虚拟币交易平台
urlInfo.text: 打造全球游戏数字化资产的交易平台，支持G币交易及为未来 Game.com 孵化或众投的更多游戏项目代币提供交易支持服务。服务全球几十亿游戏玩家的数字化资产的兑换平台，同时与全球各交易平台形成共生共赢的合作关系。

urlInfo.title: im.game.com
urlInfo.name: Game me - IM
urlInfo.text: 打造全球最大游戏IM，用Game.com全球唯一id统一全球游戏玩家。连接全球Game Connect，成为h5手游的最大分发中心 。

about.title: GTC
about.name: Using games to grow blockchain technology!
about.text: GTC（简称G币）是由Game.com全球发行的基于以太坊 ERC20 的去中心化的区块链数字资产，G币致力于成为全球游戏行业的通用数字货币标准。GTC 总发行量为 20 亿枚，当前发行量为 10 亿枚，“糖果G计划”赠送预留 10 亿枚。
about.smalltext: “糖果G计划”说明：当 GTC 市值未来达到 1 ETH = 300 GTC 时，智能合约自动激活“糖果G计划”将赠送所有持有 GTC 的用户总计 10 亿枚 GTC，即每个用户都将额外获赠当时所持有 GTC 数量的 1 倍。

using.title: GTC应用场景
using.text: GTC致力于打造全球游戏行业的通用数字货币。当前，GTC已经可以在如下实际应用场景进行使用
using.infoOne: 游戏内核心功能只支持 GTC 消耗升级，带来玩家对GTC的需求量大涨，需求大涨对应 GTC 在交易所的价格大涨。
using.infoTwo: 全球众多合作伙伴正在接入GTC，一起开创新未来!

alliance.title: GTC战略同盟
alliance.text: Game.com将为如下战略同盟，打造游戏平台。 （以下排名不分先后）

exchange.title: GTC交易所支持
exchange.name: GTC即将在 2018年3月 同步在如下全球化的交易平台进行交易 。
exchange.more: 更多交易平台即将上线，敬请期待

guide.title: 如何购买GTC？
guide.text: 您可以在以上全球化的交易平台进行交易购买。

guide.title: 如何出售您拥有的GTC？
guide.text: 您可以在以上全球化的交易平台进行交易出售；或者您可以在
guide.highlight: Game.com 支持的合作游戏内兑换您的 GTC 为其他数字货币。

footer.title: 接入GTC，一起开创未来！
footer.text: 我们专注打造 GTC 的全球化，通过创造和整合游戏内容的方式，结盟各家区块链基金会，帮助各家的数字货币提供落地的娱乐服务应用场景，用娱乐内容的方式助力区块链技术快速普及和发展。

join.text: 诚挚的邀请您加入 GTC 全球战略同盟！
立即为您的游戏或娱乐内容平台接入 GTC！

about.title: GTC
about.text: GTC（简称G币）是由Game.com全球发行的基于以太坊 ERC20 的去中心化的区块链数字资产，G币致力于成为全球游戏行业的通用数字货币标准。GTC 总发行量为 20 亿枚，当前发行量为 10 亿枚，“糖果G计划”赠送预留 10 亿枚。
about.smalltext: “糖果G计划”说明：当 GTC 市值未来达到 1 ETH = 300 GTC 时，智能合约自动激活“糖果G计划”将赠送所有持有 GTC 的用户总计 10 亿枚 GTC，即每个用户都将额外获赠当时所持有 GTC 数量的 1 倍。

vision.title: GTC愿景
vision.text: 目前全球游戏产业预计2018年将突破2000亿美金，而我们携手全球合作伙伴，直接在区块链的游戏新生态上做新的增量。让我们共同携手，一起把GTC在区块链上打造成为全球游戏行业的代币标准，来自全球顶级品牌Game.com与您的共同成果。

alliance.title: GTC战略同盟
alliance.text: Game.com将为如下战略同盟，打造游戏平台。

using.title: GTC应用案例
using.text: GTC致力于打造全球游戏行业的通用数字货币。当前，GTC已经可以在如下实际应用场景进行使用。

creativity.title: GTC应用创意
creativity.textone: 全球玩家会在支持GTC的游戏里娱乐消费到独有的特殊内容。我们和知名的成功游戏合作，共同推出在游戏内只支持GTC购买的独特游戏道具和内容。
creativity.texttwo: GTC可以和您合作定制独有的游戏内商品或道具，限量且只支持GTC抢购。玩家体验到的娱乐内容独有，玩家开心！GTC稀缺有限，您的游戏产生的GTC营收也同时大大增值。两全其美！

dreamfund.title: GTC梦想基金
dreamfund.text: 这个世界需要给予天才们更加优越的创造环境和机会，让梦想路上更顺畅！GTC梦想基金，愿意为有创意和才华的团队给予投资孵化的支持，助力您的梦想起航！
dreamfund.smalltext: 立即提交您的产品计划书，获得GTC梦想基金的支持

footer.title: 接入GTC，一起开创未来！
footer.name: 立即为您的游戏或娱乐内容平台接入GTC！
footer.email: 联系邮箱： gtc@game.com 微信：snsgame
footer.textone: 我们专注打造GTC的全球化，通过创造和整合游戏内容的方式，结盟各家区块链数字货币基金会，帮助各家的数字货币提供落地的娱乐服务应用场景，用娱乐内容的方式助力区块链技术快速普及和发展。同时，我们也需要来自全世界的内容创造者，让我们一起携手，共建基于区块链数字货币的游戏新生态！未来，属于我们一起！
footer.texttwo: 您的游戏核心功能只支持GTC数字货币，带来玩家对GTC的需求量大涨，对应GTC在全球各大数字货币交易所的价格稳步上涨。游戏带来的GTC收益，将为您带来持续增值的回报！

entertainment.title: 来自全球顶级品牌Game.com与您共同打造专属的游戏娱乐平台。
entertainment.name: 区块链内，合纵连横，互相壮大！

message.text: 我们专注打造区块链数字货币的的全球化游戏平台，通过创造和整合游戏内容的方式，结盟各家区块链数字货币的基金会，帮助各家的数字货币提供落地的娱乐服务应用场景，用娱乐内容的方式助力区块链技术快速普及和发展。
目前全球游戏产业预计2018年将突破2000亿美金，而我们期许在区块链上携手合作伙伴共同打造游戏平台和内容，直接在区块链的游戏新生态上做新的增量。
我们直接为您部署打造游戏娱乐平台直接面向全球用户运营，玩家使用您的数字货币用于游戏娱乐内容的消费。

collaboration.title: 合作案例
collaboration.name: Game.com致力于打造全球化的数字货币游戏平台。当前，我们已经可以在如下实际应用场景进行游戏娱乐。

platform.name: 波场基金会合作打造的游戏内容娱乐平台

footer.text: 游戏只支持合作伙伴的数字货币，带来玩家对数字货币的需求量大涨， 对应您的数字货币在交易所的价格稳步上涨。
footer.smalltext: 诚挚的邀请您与Game.com成为全球战略同盟！

world.textone: 宠物星球是基于以太坊区块链技术而运作的虚拟世界！他是世界上首个使用区块链技术开发的游戏之一。
world.texttwo: 在宠物星球，你可以购买心爱的宠物，也可以经营宠物商店出售宠物，还可以和宠物星球的所有住户在一起做很多即将让你充满期待的事情~
world.textthree: 基于区块链技术，您在宠物星球的所有数字资产和宠物，都将永久安全的保护在您的名下，让我们一起迎接和拥抱新世界！

platform.title: play.game.com
platform.name: Game.com 区块链游戏平台
platform.textone: 宠物星球是基于以太坊区块链技术而运作的虚拟世界！他是世界上首个使用区块链技术开发的游戏之一。
platform.texttwo: 在宠物星球，你可以购买心爱的宠物，也可以经营宠物商店出售宠物，还可以和宠物星球的所有住户在一起做很多即将让你充满期待的事情~
platform.textthree: 基于区块链技术，您在宠物星球的所有数字资产和宠物，都将永久安全的保护在您的名下，让我们一起迎接和拥抱新世界！

platform.title: crowdfunding.game.com
platform.name: 游戏众投发行
platform.textone: Game.com是一个全球创新的众投平台，被数字货币用户 评选为全球最值得信赖的投资平台。
platform.texttwo: 数字货币诞生至今，已成未来趋势。Game.com基于数字货币生态，提供Crowdfunding创新金融服务，打造全球最大的数字货币众投平台，为梦想加油！

platform.title: im.game.com
platform.name: Game me - IM
platform.textone: Game.com 拓展全球各大手机游戏公司展开合作，可以瞬间支撑起一个全世界第三大的IM: Game me! 连接全球游戏玩家。让全球的游戏玩家有一个共同的全球唯一Game.com ID来随时连接。
platform.texttwo: Game me! 这是一张全世界的连接名片。IM被重新定义，并不需要加好友扫二维码才可以连接，你的id就是你的全球的名片，任何人可以和你建立连接就像写邮件一样。

vision.title: Game.com愿景
vision.text: 我们专注打造GTC的全球化，通过创造和整合游戏内容的方式，结盟各家区块链基金会，帮助各家的数字货币提供落地的娱乐服务应用场景，用娱乐内容的方式助力区块链技术快速普及和发展。

method.title: Game.com模式
method.text: 游戏娱乐内容在各区块链项目上直接落地运营。玩家去交易所买币用于游戏娱乐内容的消费。投资者买币用于投资升值。

creatorCeo.infoone: 做游戏内容是我们百人研发团队擅长的事情。同时我们在游戏行业的资源和整合能力可以把GTC在区块链行业发扬光大，努力变成区块链游戏的代币标准，打造全球顶级游戏品牌Game.com。
creatorCeo.infotwo: 区块链内，合纵连横，互相壮大! 区块链外，快速吸收内容普及GTC，生来独角兽，打造世界梦。
creatorCeo.name: 创始人 CEO 创业至今18年

message.title: 2000年 - 考入清华大学，于2006年本科毕业。
2002年 - 暂时终止大学学业，并创立了中国第一家在线支付平台网站易付通。
2004年 - 回到清华大学继续完成学业 。
2006年 - 大学毕业前获得IDG投资并创立了中国第一个体验购买营销平台“试用网”。
2010年 - 创立SNSGAME，2012年更名为TOPGAME。
2012年 - 当选《创业邦》“30岁以下创业企业家”奖以及福布斯中国“40岁以下创业企业家”奖。
2012年 - 12月当选为“2012年梦想行动派-谁是80后新偶像”之创业派偶像。
2015年 - 7月中旬，TOPGAME完成并购新三板壳公司的上市。(2014年TOPGAME在徐乐的产品带领下创造了年利润3000万美金的爆品游戏)
2015年 - 10月，创办你好世界(Game.com & nihao.com)
期间徐乐投资了近30家公司如已上市的多点科技，引爆直播潮流的台湾17，华谊兄弟投资的剧角映画电影公司等等，最终决定投资自己创业干一件一辈子的平台型事业。
2017年 - 4月，Game.com旗下子公司你好nihao.com时间交易平台正式上线。 (现在升级为Game.com众投平台)。
2017年 - 10月，Game.com 正式启动，让我们一起为梦想而奋斗!

investing.title: 部分投资机构
investing.name: 部分战略投资机构名单(排名不分先后)

urlInfo.title: play.game.com
urlInfo.name: Game.com blockchain gaming platform
urlInfo.text: We’re focused on creating a globalized gaming platform for blockchain digital currencies. By creating and integrating game content, we have formed a foundation for blockchain digital currencies that will help provide digital currency solutions for a variety of entertainment services. Entertaining content is the way to help blockchain technology develop at a more rapid pace, making it more popular.

urlInfo.title: crowdfunding.game.com
urlInfo.name: Game crowdfunding
urlInfo.text: By creating the primary crowdfunding and information portal for the global games industry, exclusive and top quality projects are able to nurtured by GToken Fund, with an early bird phase only allowing G coin investments.

urlInfo.title: wallet.game.com
urlInfo.name: G Wallet for digital assets
urlInfo.text: A smart digital asset wallet for gamers worldwide, implementing digital asset management, future Game.com investment and crowdfunding for game projects provide support for G Wallet. This is an innovation for the unknown “blue ocean” market, a digital asset wallet for billions of gamers the world over!

urlInfo.title: vc.game.com
urlInfo.name: GToken Fund
urlInfo.text: Investment structure – Gtoken Fund has a game-specific G Coin investment foundation for investing in top quality projects in the games industry. G Coins continue to increase in value.

urlInfo.title: trading.game.com
urlInfo.name: A virtual currency trading platform for games
urlInfo.text: A global digital asset trade platform for games, supporting G coins, and providing support for further Game.com investment and crowdfunding projects in the future. The digital asset trading platform can also service billions of gamers around the world, all while cooperating with a variety of trading platforms to form a kind of symbiotic relationship that benefits everyone.

urlInfo.title: im.game.com
urlInfo.name: Game me - IM
urlInfo.text: Creating the world’s largest messaging platform for games. A unique Game.com ID unifies gamers everywhere. Connect to the global Game connect, set to become the biggest distribution center for HTML5 games.

about.title: GTC
about.name: Using games to grow blockchain technology!
about.text: GTC (G Coins) is Game.com’s global decentralized blockchain virtual currency based on the Etherium ERC20 standard, intended to become standard virtual currency for the global games industry. A total of 2 billion GTC have been made available.
about.smalltext: *Candy G Plan: Once the market value of GTC reaches 1 ETH = 300 GTC, the Candy G Plan is automatically activated, awarding all current GTC holders a total of 1 billion GTC. Each user receives the value of their GTC balance as extra GTC (effectively doubling the balance).

using.title: Using GTC
using.text: GTC is intended to become the virtual currency of the global games industry, and is currently accepted in the following applications.
using.infoOne: Your games core features only support GTC digital currency, leading to a rise in demand for GTC from players, in turn leading to a rise in the exchange value of GTC.
using.infoTwo: Global crowdfunding partners now have access to GTC, let's create a new future!

alliance.title: GTC strategic alliance
alliance.text: Game.com has created a game platform for the following strategic alliances (in no particular order).

exchange.title: GTC exchange support
exchange.name: GTC will be tradeable on the following global trade platforms starting in March,2018.
exchange.more: More trade platforms coming soon, so keep an eye out.

guide.title: How do I buy GTC？
guide.text: You can purchase GTC on the trade platforms shown above.

guide.title: How do I sell my GTC？
guide.text: You can sell GTC on the trade platforms shown above,
guide.highlight: or you can exchange your GTC for other digital currency in partner games supported by Game.com.

footer.title: Let's create a new future with GTC!
footer.text: Our focus is on making GTC global, by creating an integrating game content. The alliance of the blockchain Digital Monetary Fund exists to help each other provide entertainment services and applications, using entertainment content to help with the development and popularization of blockchain technology.

join.text: We cordially invite you to join the strategic alliance with Game.com!
Get GTC for your game or entertainment platform now!

about.title: About GTC
about.text: GTC (G Coins) is Game.com’s global decentralized blockchain virtual currency based on the Etherium ERC20 standard, intended to become standard virtual currency for the global games industry. A total of 2 billion GTC have been made available.
about.smalltext: *Candy G Plan: Once the market value of GTC reaches 1 ETH = 300 GTC, the Candy G Plan is automatically activated, awarding all current GTC holders a total of 1 billion GTC. Each user receives the value of their GTC balance as extra GTC (effectively doubling the balance).

vision.title: GTC vision
vision.text: The global games industry is expected to break the 200 billion USD barrier in 2018, and we are working with our global partners to directly make new additions to the blockchain games ecosystem. Let’s work together to make GTC the standard currency for the global games industry, certainly achievable with the combination of the Game.com brand and yourselves working together.

alliance.title: GTC strategic alliance
alliance.text: Game.com has created a game platform for the following strategic alliances:

using.title: Using GTC
using.text: GTC is intended to become the virtual currency of the global games industry, and is currently accepted in the following applications.

creativity.title: GTC creativity
creativity.textone: Global gamers can experience unique game content that supports GTC purchases. We’re working together with successful game developers to develop in-game items and content that can only be purchased with GTC.
creativity.texttwo: GTC can work with you to create unique game content and in-game items that can only be purchased with GTC. A player who experiences entertaining game content is a happy player! GTC resources are limited, so GTC revenue generated by your game will be greatly increased in value. The best of both worlds!

dreamfund.title: GTC Dream Fund
dreamfund.text: The world needs to give talented developers the environment and opportunity to realize their dreams! With the GTC dream fund, there is a will to invest in talented and creative developers, helping you to realize your dreams!
dreamfund.smalltext: Submit your product plan now,and get support from the GTC dream fund!

footer.title: Let's create a new future with GTC!
footer.name: Get GTC now for your game or entertainment content!
footer.textone: Our focus is on making GTC global, by creating and integrating game content. The alliance of the blockchain Digital Monetary Fund exists to help each other provide entertainment services and applications, using entertainment content to help with the development and popularization of blockchain technology.
footer.texttwo: We cordially invite you to join the global GTC strategic alliance! Contact: you@game.com
footer.textthree: Incorporate GTC into your game or entertainment platform now! Contact: gtc@game.com
footer.textfour: Your games core features only support GTC digital currency, leading to a rise in demand for GTC from players, in turn leading to a steady rise in the exchange value of GTC. GTC profits from your game bring you a sustained value-added return!

entertainment.title: The top brand Game.com is working with you to build a dedicated gaming entertainment platform.
entertainment.name: Working with blockchain technology for mutual benefit!

message.text: We’re focused on creating a globalized gaming platform for blockchain digital currencies. By creating and integrating game content, we have formed a foundation for blockchain digital currencies that will help provide digital currency solutions for a variety of entertainment services. Entertaining content is the way to help blockchain technology develop at a more rapid pace, making it more popular.

The global games industry is expected to break the 200 billion USD barrier in 2018, and we are working with our partners to make new game platforms and content, directly making new additions to the new blockchain games ecosystem.

The global games industry is expected to break the 200 billion USD barrier in 2018, and we are working with our partners to make new game platforms and content, directly making new additions to the new blockchain games ecosystem.

footer.text: Your games core features only support GTC digital currency, leading to a rise in demand for GTC from players, in turn leading to a steady rise in the exchange value of GTC.

world.textone: Pet Planet is a virtual world based on Ethereum blockchain technology! In fact, it’s one of the first games in the world to be developed with blockchain technology.
world.texttwo: In Pet Planet, you can buy pets, but you can also start your own store and sell them. You will also be able to do all kinds of things together with other Pet Planet users, so stay tuned for more details.
world.textthree: Based on blockchain technology, all of your digital assets and digital pets in Pet Planet belong to you forever. It’s time to embrace a new and better world!

platform.title: play.game.com
platform.name: Game.com blockchain gaming platform
platform.textone: Pet Planet is a virtual world based on Ethereum blockchain technology! In fact, it’s one of the first games in the world to be developed with blockchain technology.
platform.texttwo: In Pet Planet, you can buy pets, but you can also start your own store and sell them. You will also be able to do all kinds of things together with other Pet Planet users, so stay tuned for more details.
platform.textthree: Based on blockchain technology, all of your digital assets and digital pets in Pet Planet belong to you forever. It’s time to embrace a new and better world!

platform.title: crowdfunding.game.com
platform.name: Game crowdfunding
platform.textone: Game.com is an innovative new global crowdfunding platform. Rated by digital currency users as the world’s most trustworthy investment platform.
platform.texttwo: The birth of digital currency has become the trend of the future. Game.com is based on a digital currency ecosystem, providing an innovative crowdfunding financial service, creating the world’s largest digital currency crowdfunding platform. Here’s to dreams coming true!

platform.title: im.game.com
platform.name: Game me - IM
platform.textone: Game.com expands the world’s major mobile games companies to work together in providing instant support to the world’s third largest IM: Game me! Connecting the world’s gamers. Gamers around the world can have a common unique Game.com ID to connect with each other at any time.
platform.texttwo: Game me! A global business card. Instant messaging has been redefined, and no longer requires scanning QR codes to add friends. Your ID is your global business card, and any person can connect with you just as they would with email.

vision.title: Game.com’s vision
vision.text: Our focus is on making GTC global, by creating an integrating game content. The alliance of the blockchain Digital Monetary Fund exists to help each other provide entertainment services and applications, using entertainment content to help with the development and popularization of blockchain technology.

method.title: Game.com’s method
method.text: When it comes to game and entertainment content in blockchain projects, players can purchase currency and use it to make purchases in-game or in-app. Investors can purchase currency for the purpose of increasing in value.

creatorCeo.infoone: Making games is something we developers are good at. Our resources and integration capabilities in the games industry can make GTC flourish in the blockchain industry, and ultimately become the standard currency for blockchain games, building Game.com into a leading global brand. We can work with blockchain technology for mutual benefit, and quickly popularize GTC for game content. Dreams do come true!
creatorCeo.name: Creator, CEO, and entrepreneur for 18 years.

message.title: 2000 - Enrolled in Tsinghua University, graduated in 2006.
2002 - Took a hiatus from full-time study to initiate work on China’s first online payment platform.
2004 - Returned to full-time study at Tsinghua University.
2006 - Prior to graduation received investment from IDG to establish China’s first experience based marketing platform – “ItrybeforeIbuy”.
2010 - Founded SNSGAME. Name changed to Topgame in 2012.
2012 - Chosen as one of Forbes China’s 30 entrepreneurs under 30 years of age.
December 2012 - “2012 Achiever of the Year – New Idol of the 80s Generation” in Entrepreneurship.
2015 mid-July, TOPGAME finished merging with NEEQ companies and went public. (In 2014, Le Xu led Topgame in creating one of the top games, which had an annual profit of 30 million USD.)
2015 - In October, founded Game.com and Nihao.com.

Also during this time, Le Xu invested in nearly 30 companies, including the listed company Duodian Technology, Taiwan 17, which led the trend in live streaming, Magilm Pictures, invested in by H.BROTHER, etc.; and finally made the decision to invest in his own life-long enterprise of platform-based business.
2017 - In April, the subsidiary company of Game.com - nihao.com - time trade platform formally launched(Has since been upgraded to Game.com crowdfunding platform).
2017 - In October, Formal launch of Game.com. Let's fight for our dreams together!

investing.title: Investing organizations
investing.name: Some of our strategic investor organizations (in no particular order)
